data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valencia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Valencia at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Elche throw-in in Valencia's half.
Can Elche capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
In the minute 7, Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
Throw-in Elche.
Throw-in for Elche in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 14, Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Goal! Elche have got their heads in front thanks to a Josan strike.
Elche needs to be cautious. Valencia have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Elche.
In the minute 23, Elche awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Elche to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, Elche to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
In Elche, Josan of Elche is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Elche in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 28, Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
In Elche a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick Valencia.
Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
Throw-in for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
In the minute 36, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Valencia.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Elche extend their lead to 2-0 through Fidel.
In the minute 37, Josan instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Valencia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Valencia's Carlos Soler breaks free at Estadio Martínez Valero. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the home team in Elche.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Throw-in Elche.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Valencia in the half of Elche.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Gabriel Paulista (Valencia) has received a yellow card from Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Elche.
Elche awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Valencia at Estadio Martínez Valero.
The home team have replaced Jeison Lucumi with Tete Morente. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Almiron.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Free kick for Elche in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 49, Cesar Soto Grado signals a Valencia throw-in in Elche's half.
Valencia have a dangerous throw-in.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Valencia.
Valencia's Jose Luis Gaya goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Free kick Valencia.
Goal kick for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Valencia.
Valencia's Goncalo Guedes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Elche defender.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Valencia close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Jose Luis Gaya of Valencia gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 56, Elche have a goal kick.
In Elche a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mouctar Diakhaby is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 60, Mouctar Diakhaby, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Hugo Guillamon is the substitute for Valencia.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Valencia are pushing forward but Goncalo Guedes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, Cesar Soto Grado awards Elche a goal kick.
Throw-in for Elche in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Elche.
Jorge Almiron is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Martínez Valero with Youssouf Kone replacing Emiliano Rigoni.
In Elche, Valencia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Estadio Martínez Valero, Valencia are penalized for being offside.
Valencia's Carlos Soler gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Martínez Valero. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Manu Vallejo is replacing Goncalo Guedes for Valencia at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a third substitution, with Kang In Lee replacing Jose Luis Gaya.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Elche.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Elche throw-in in Valencia's half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a throw-in for Elche, close to Valencia's area.
In the minute 71, Gabriel Paulista for Valencia drives towards goal at Estadio Martínez Valero. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Valencia's Thierry Correia misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
Elche drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Lato Toni puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 74, Great play from Kang In Lee to set up the goal.
In Elche Valencia drive forward through Manu Vallejo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in high up the field for Valencia in Elche.
In the minute 76, Important block from the Elche defence as Daniel Wass fires in a strike for Valencia.
Can Valencia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elche's half?
Valencia are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 77, Raul Guti (Elche) gets a yellow card.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Valencia just outside Elche's area.
Valencia are coming forward and Kang In Lee gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Valencia are caught offside.
In the minute 81, Free kick Valencia.
Valencia's Daniel Wass gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Elche.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Javi Gracia is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Martínez Valero with Uros Racic replacing Daniel Wass.
In the minute 86, Jason is replacing Yunus Musah for Valencia at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Fidel is booked for the home team.
In the minute 87, Valencia push forward at Estadio Martínez Valero and Uros Racic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Elche defence.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Elche have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Elche a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Valencia at Estadio Martínez Valero.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Elche make their third substitution with Omenuke Mfulu replacing Raul Guti.
Antonio Barragan for Elche has been booked by Cesar Soto Grado and receives a first yellow card.
Jorge Almiron (Elche) is making a fourth substitution, with Dani Calvo replacing Josan.
Lato Toni (Valencia) has received a first yellow card.
